pullRequest.title: Moved project reference file request
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description of changes
What did you change in this pull request?  Provide a description of files changed, user interactions changed, etc.  Include how to test your changes.
Moved getting of reference files for projects into the reference fil ajax controller.
Related issue
Link to the GitHub issue this pull request addresses using the #issuenum format.  If it completes an issue, use Fixes #issuenum to automatically close the issue.
Checklist
Things for the developer to confirm they've done before the PR should be accepted:
* [ ] CHANGELOG.md (and UPGRADING.md if necessary) updated with information for new change.
* [ ] Tests added (or description of how to test) for any new features.
* [ ] User documentation updated for UI or technical changes.

commit.message: Moved getting of reference files for projects into the reference file ajax controller. Updated tests

nodes.bodyText: Same as your controller method, do we really need the /all at the end?  What might be a better pattern here is /ajax/reference-files?projectId=4 or something similar.  That way we know exactly when we write that url that is for a project.  Food for thought.

commit.message: Updated url for getting reference files for projects
